title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and fluent API.

title: chainlit-ollama-example
summary: Cookbook showing how to plug Ollama models into Chainlit conversational apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Browser extension that turns any textarea into an LLM copilot powered by local Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Next.js chatbot template that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with async providers and Swagger docs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with C# 12 support and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit app template for chatting with Ollama models and comparing outputs side-by-side.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with Open-WebUI, n8n, Flowise and more.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama news, model sharing and troubleshooting.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing Ollama v0.1.20 release with multi-model and tool-use features.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package showing download stats and changelog.
